titleStmt.title: Improved enumeration of simple topological graphs

analytic.title: Improved enumeration of simple topological graphs

application.ref: GROBID - A machine learning software for extracting information from scholarly documents

div.head: tools:
div.p: • weak isomorphism class ↔ a rotation system • (J. Pach, J. Solymosi and G. Tóth, 2003) Every simple complete topological graph with 4 30 4 vertices contains one of the following subgraphs:
div.formula: a convex graph C 5 a twisted graph T 6 v1 v2 v3 v4 v5 v6
div.p: Weak isomorphism classes, complete graphs tools:
• weak isomorphism class ↔ a rotation system • (J. Pach, J. Solymosi and G. Tóth, 2003) Every simple complete topological graph with 4 30 4 vertices contains one of the following subgraphs:
div.formula: a convex graph C 5 a twisted graph T 6 v1 v2 v3 v4 v5 v6
div.p: • an upper bound on the size of a set of permutations with bounded VC-dimension (J. Cibulka and JK, 2012)

div.p: • types of (pseudo)chords ⇒ pairs of crossing edges

div.p: • types of (pseudo)chords ⇒ pairs of crossing edges • bounded number of crossings of the pseudochords
